storyInfo: After rescuing the Plastic Knight from the Armorless Union, 'Fartooth' Justyna recalls the fate that befell her and the home she can't return to.

attributes.text: You're looking that way again? At the Grand Knight Territory?
I know the Grand Knight Territory. That's where the powerful knight lords compete against each other, right?
You never stop talking about it, of course I know!
Hey, Justyna, you're really planning to go there?

I know you've been practicing whenever you don't have farm work. Everybody in the village knows you want to be a knight. You can fight off the bandits who come looking for trouble, they're no match for you.
But the Grand Knight Territory is pretty far... If you go, will you ever come back?
You will? Really? After you become a knight?
It's a promise then. We'll wait for you to come home, showered in glory, and then we'll spread the word that our town is the home of the Justyna, the knight!

attributes.content: No footprints, no tracks at all...
attributes.name: Armorless Union Assassin

attributes.content: They didn't go this way.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Assassin

attributes.content: The hospital team lost the target, they're bound to pass through here if they're trying to escape.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Captain

attributes.content: Stay alert. I want regular reports.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Captain

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Assassin

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Armorless Union Assassin

attributes.content: Guh... agh...
attributes.name: Armorless Union Assassin

attributes.content: Go.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: They're going to know something's wrong. Come with me while there's still time.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: I don't take orders from Infected.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Though I admit you have some skill, able to handle those lowlifes from that distance.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: But don't think that means I'm here to listen to you.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: The Armorless have this whole place surrounded. You're not getting out of here alone.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: They're not going to give up the chase.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: So what?
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: I'll make them pay for it.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: That's not going to be easy.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Your wounds haven't healed, how can you hide from them like this?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Ugh... damned Armorless.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: I'll go along with you for now, but only because we share a common enemy. I'll make those murderers pay for what they did!
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: We'll talk about that later, we're still in danger here.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Don't think I have anything else to say to you later.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Listen girly, you've got a certain champion to thank for the fact that you're standing here, speaking to me in that armor.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: You're not wrong.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: There was a time when I had bottomless gratitude for the Blood Knight.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Why so quiet?
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Competition.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: I watched you go up against Maria Nearl—'Plastic' Szewczyk.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: I don't like you.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: You're slightly less obnoxious out on the field.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Your feelings don't matter, but watch the attitude. You should never have taken me out of the hospital.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: It was Sona's idea. And anyway—
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: And anyway nothing. Sona is your leader's name? Hmph, sounds like another little girl.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: She's a friend.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: I'll take you back to the base. Sona and my other friends are all waiting for us.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Make no mistake, I may have agreed to work with you for now, but I'm not part of your group, infected knight.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: No, I'm very clear, you're not at all like us.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: But, 'Plastic' Szewczyk, you must know, you have no hope of resisting the Armorless Union alone.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Heh... Sure, you're right about that.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: It's funny, Kazimierz as it is today. An Infected can be a knight, and a gang of thugs like the Armorless can roam about freely.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Funny...
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Let's meet up with the others first.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: We won't get anything done by ourselves.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Ten days earlier...
Just who the hell are you people?!
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: There's no end to them...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Hiding in the crowd, are you?!
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Don't think I won't—
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Wait! Don't do it!
Ah... looks like I'm a little late? How did this turn into such a warzone?
Not good. Not good at all.
Anyway, let's pick up the pace. Start evacuating people first.
That's all we can do.
It's you...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Hey there, 'Fartooth' Knight, I still haven't had a chance to congratulate you on your title. Nice job there.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: I saw a piece on you. Popularity's through the roof, huh?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Announcing a new knightclub, getting real controversial, pushing that popularity up, hm? Hmph, looks like you've kicked a hornet's nest to me.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: Infected knights...
attributes.name: A Strange Passerby

attributes.content: That's enough of that.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: A Strange Passerby

attributes.content: Alright, anyway, the fight's fought, what's done is done. *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Flametail, and Ashlock... What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Do you know who these people are?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Like the back of my hand. But this isn't a good place for a chat... these guys are looking to make a scene, and the media will be here before long. That wouldn't end well for you.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: And anyway, you're probably hurt, right?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Just come with us, all nice and quiet-like, and we'll explain nice and slow what's going on. What do you say?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Do you have to say it like you're kidnapping her?
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: Huh? Did I?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: A little.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: I'll go. I trust you.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Sorry, what?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Just take me along, wherever you're going. I trust you.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: I feel like...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: We're the same. I can trust you.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Where are we...?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Oh! That was fast. Your wounds all better?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Are all these people here Infected?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Sure are. Everyone who lives here is. Most got unlucky, got sick in an accident or something, lost their jobs and homes, ended up with nowhere to go.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Granted, the room and board here is a little rough, but... it's better than nothing, right?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Sona, Iwona's in trouble, I'll go see what I can do.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: The Armorless Union is probably still active. I'll tell the others to be careful too.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: Alright. Don't worry, I'm on it.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Right. You've got it.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: She...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Hm? Oh, you mean Ashley? She's a good girl. The way she talks is just a little too straight up sometimes.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: She hasn't said a word to me since we first met.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Ahaha! Ashley's a little shy with strangers too.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: *Sigh*. Well, alright...
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Ashley just thinks you're too different from us, like you've walked a different path.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: I mean, you're a star of the Major, with a shiny new knight title, so hot right now!
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: No matter which way you look at it, you've got a bright future!
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: No... I don't.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: An Infected... an Infected knight... has no future.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: That doesn't sound like something a big competition winner would say.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: I used to think that as long as I could be a knight, there was still hope. If I could win in the arena, maybe...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Maybe you could even earn some respect, be seen as a true knight, and win back the life you used to have?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Yes... That's what I thought.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: But that's not how it works. An Infected knight is still Infected. And that's all that matters.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Yeah. That's pretty much what I've said to Ashley.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: And besides, so what if you're a knight? Just look what happened to you back there in that crowd. Those folks who jumped you didn't care if you're Infected or noble or whatever.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: You were saying they're with the Armorless Union?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Knight-Assassins... the words feel gross in my mouth.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Yeah, that's them.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: They sell themselves to the General Chamber of Commerce, bumping off knights who don't play ball... They call themselves experts in handling knights, and wear that with pride.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: And add on the rewards, in cheers and treasure, that the audience heaps upon the knights, proper or not, how much dignity is left in the title? That's before you even talk about us.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: So me getting attacked this time, that was the K.G.C.C.'s orders?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Probably. You've got the spotlight on you, and you're turning down all the knightclub invitations, and talking like you do out there... sooner or later, you get a knock like that at your door.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: And if you won't be their goldmine, then they find you a 'dishonorable' exit, so you won't get in the way of their business.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: So you know, not that crazy you'd get attacked.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Two three-week periods.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: On my way to the Grand Knight Territory, I got infected.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: And since I was Infected, they wouldn't let me register as a knight. So I wandered around for three weeks with nowhere to stay.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: It was during the third week that the Blood Knight won the Major.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Then, three weeks later, they opened the registration window for Infected knights.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: I didn't have any money left on me, so I went to the black market ring, working up enough money to pay the registration fees.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: That... couldn't have been easy.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Underground knight sports for infected knights is pretty much the same as the black market.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: From the underground competitions to the Major, I've seen too many ridiculous things to be surprised anymore.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Haha! Fair enough. There's definitely stuff going on in the underground fights that tops whatever the Armorless Union can come up with.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: We've all been through stuff like that, more or less, and that's how we end up here.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: There sure are a lot of Infected here.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Right... how can I put it? You can make a lot in the knight competitions, at least enough to buy a place for these people who have nowhere else to go.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: So that means the money's still worth something, right?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Heh. Nice.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: You're easier to get along with than we might've thought. When I first bumped into you, I was worried you were all icy cold.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Oh? You got all quiet?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: I don't know...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: I just... I just don't know... I guess I don't know what to say at times like this.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Ugh.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Alright... I think I get it now. You and Ashley are both shy with strangers.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: And this habit of yours where you say half a thing up front, I think I'm getting used to it. Not that there's anything wrong with it, it's just tricky to follow sometimes.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Either way, thanks for helping me.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Ah, it was nothing. Don't sweat it.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: So anyway, where are you gonna go? If you pop right back out, they're gonna go after you again.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: That scuffle back there is gonna get reported soon. What do you think we'll see on the news?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: No idea. Whatever they want.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Honestly... I don't know where I'd go. I haven't had anywhere to go for a long time.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Well, you may think I'm just throwing it out there to hold it over you, but this is an honest offer, out of the kindness of my heart.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: There's me, and Ashley, and Iwona, you've seen her, with the big loud mouth?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Yes, I know her.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: The truth is... we had the same idea as you, in your little statement about setting up an independent knightclub.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: I came up with the name already. Pinus Sylvestris. The Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub, a club of our very own.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: And since you've got nowhere to go, Justyna, wouldn't you consider maybe joining us?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: You're... inviting me?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Are you sure?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Sure as sure can be. Can I spell it out any clearer for you?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Alright. I'm in.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: —Us... together.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.text: Play your flute again, won't you? Whatever you want. Everyone loves hearing you play.
We won't get to hear that again for a long time. Everyone's gonna miss you.
Aren't you worried about going so far all alone? We know you get lonely, you're just too shy to admit it. Always sitting quietly off to the side.
You think the wind might carry your voice back home?
You're going to be a knight. We all believe you're going to be an amazing one, like that Radiant Knight you're so fond of.

attributes.content: Now that we're here, we're safe. Someone will meet us out front.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: How are your wounds?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Fine. Just a scratch, barely worth mentioning. But you Infected knights, you base yourselves here in the city? Not out in a village somewhere?
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: No one would allow the Infected to live within the city limits. Just what are you up to?
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Nothing.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: When you've got money, you can do anything.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Hah... money. True enough. So long as you have money, you can do anything here.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: But if word gets out, you'll be arrested.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Anyone eager to open their mouth gets a word with my arrows first.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: I won't allow anyone to harm the Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Then lead the way. I can't stand the thought of the Armorless Union scum on the loose out there. I'm working against the General Chamber of Commerce now, so I need to move fast.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Show me to your Infected knight leader, who forced one of your strength to drag me out of the hospital against your will.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Not against my will.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: It wasn't Sona who sent me to rescue you. It was my own choice. Not at all against my will.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: But how? I understand we have a mutual distaste for one another.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Or is this some kind of big picture play?
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: It's just... you have a family.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: What are you talking about?!
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Those insects! They dare move against my boy?!
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Don't worry, Sona has eyes on him. The Armorless backed off. They didn't touch your son.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Then I must offer my thanks.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: You owe them to Sona. It was all her idea.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: As for me, my personal feelings towards you have nothing to do with whether or not I'll let you get hurt.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: I just... your son...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Without you, he'd have nowhere to go.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Justyna the Knight has a home, with family and friends waiting for her.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: But Justyna the Infected doesn't.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: An Infected has nowhere to go.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: No, it's not just the Infected. Here, in this place, there are a lot more people with nowhere to go.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: It's too late for me. I can't go back.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: If the wind really can carry my voice home...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Then I'll have to ask it not to. Don't carry anything but the sound of my flute.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Let Justyna stay a simple, ordinary girl... dreaming of knighthood.
attributes.name: Justyna
